title: Deceptive Planning for Resource Allocation. (arXiv:2206.01306v2 [math.OC] UPDATED)
abstract: We consider a team of autonomous agents that navigate in an adversarial environment and aim to achieve a task by allocating their resources over a set of target locations. An adversary in the environment observes the autonomous team's behavior to infer their objective and responds against the team. In this setting, we propose strategies for controlling the density of the autonomous team so that they can deceive the adversary regarding their objective while achieving the desired final resource allocation. We first develop a prediction algorithm based on the principle of maximum entropy to express the team's behavior expected by the adversary. Then, by measuring the deceptiveness via Kullback-Leibler divergence, we devise convex optimization-based planning algorithms that deceive the adversary by either exaggerating the behavior towards a decoy allocation strategy or creating ambiguity regarding the final allocation strategy. translated_title: 资源分配的欺骗性规划
translated_abstract: 本文考虑在对抗环境中导航的自主代理团队，目标是通过将资源分配到一组目标位置来完成任务。环境中的对手观察自主团队的行为以推断他们的目标，并对团队做出反应。在这种情况下，我们提出了控制自主团队密度的策略，以欺骗对手关于他们的目标，同时实现所需的最终资源分配。首先，我们基于最大熵原理开发了一种预测算法，来表达对手预期的团队行为。然后，通过使用Kullback-Leibler散度来衡量欺骗性，我们设计了基于凸优化的规划算法，通过夸大行为朝着干扰分配策略或创造最终分配策略的模糊性来欺骗对手。一项涉及320名参与者的用户研究验证了我们的方法。
tldr: 本研究提出了一种在对抗环境中进行资源分配的欺骗性规划策略。通过控制自主团队的密度和行为，可以欺骗对手，并实现所需的最终资源分配。
